package.name: tomcrypt
package.description:
The tomcrypt extension provides features similar to the old mcrypt extension, using libtomcrypt as its backend.
The following features are currently supported:
* Encryption/decryption, using various ciphers & operation modes, including Authenticated Encryption with Associated Data (AEAD) * Hashing algorithms (MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, etc.) * Several algorithms to generate authentication codes (MAC, HMAC, PMAC, etc.) * (Pseudo-)Random Number Generators
